titleStmt.title: The merchant royall A sermon preached at White-Hall before the Kings Maiestie, at the nuptials of the Right Honourable the Lord Hay and his Lady, vpon the Twelfe day last being Ianuar. 6. 1607.
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Felix Kyngston for Iohn Flasket, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the black Beare,

notesStmt.note: In this edition p. 2 line 1 has "dignitie"; line 2 has "holie". Quire A is in the same setting as the other two 1607 London editions.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
